item.title: Beogram 4002 (5513) Remote Control: Now With a 3D Printed Installation Tray
item.description:
This post continues the discussion about my Beogram 4002 (5513) remote control upgrade, specifically the receiver board insulation. My previous solution, using plastic foil, wasn’t ideal aesthetically. To address this, I designed a plastic tray that safeguards the receiver board from the main circuit board’s solder points. The tray is designed to click into place without additional screws.
